About Indigenous Art Atlas

The Indigenous Art Atlas is a comprehensive digital platform dedicated to documenting, preserving, and sharing the rich heritage of indigenous art across various cultural contexts and geographical locations.

Our Mission

We strive to create a respectful and inclusive space where indigenous art can be celebrated, studied, and preserved for future generations. Our platform serves as a bridge between traditional knowledge holders and contemporary audiences.

What We Offer

  • Comprehensive database of indigenous artworks
  • Interactive mapping of art locations
  • Community-driven submissions and curation
  • Educational resources and cultural context
  • Preservation of artistic heritage

Respect and Cultural Sensitivity

We recognize the sacred and cultural significance of many indigenous artworks. Our platform includes privacy controls for sensitive locations and culturally significant pieces, ensuring that traditional protocols are respected.

Community Collaboration

This project is built in collaboration with indigenous communities, artists, and cultural institutions to ensure authentic representation and appropriate stewardship of cultural materials.
